entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 10:43 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:43 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
